From the brand

2022 Christmas is Coming!

Countdown to Xmas with Meland christmas inflatable outdoor decorations – the cute penguins, Santa Claus, Large Christmas Archway.

Christmas Inflatable Outdoors

Christmas blow ups

· 【All The Christmas outdoor decorations Characters In One Package】This Xmas inflatable decorations including the Santa Claus, Socks, tree. the cute reindeer and gift box. Such an attractive blow up Christmas decorations outdoor yard make your friends and guest impressive in the holiday party night.
· 【Self Inflates In Seconds & Light Up the Holiday Night.】Meland Christmas blow ups equipped with a strong built-in fan and internal bright lighting. When plus it into a standard electrical outlet, the Santa, the reindeer and the socks, all the Xmas display will illuminate your garden, lawn and yard at night then create a great nighttime effect and attract lots of attentions.
· 【Durable material and compact outdoor christmas decorations design.】 Our Christmas blow up yard decorations featured with lightweight and weather resistant polyester as well as compact design make it easy to set up, take down and storage, allowing your family use this Xmas inflatable christmas decorations for next year.
· 【Includes Necessary Accessories for Stability.】 Our lighted Santa inflatables outdoor decorations built-in with 3 sandbags, 6 ground stakes, 2 tether ropes for making the large countdown inflatables more stable for outdoor and indoor set up. A joyful Santa blow up yard decorations display improve the festival atmosphere and leave you a beautiful outdoor christmas inflatables memory.
· 【Adorable Outside Christmas Yard Inflatables with Decent Quality. 】Meland christmas outdoor inflatables has an IP44 waterproof rating, both UL and CE certification. A must choice for your 2022 christmas blowups decoration.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $10.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:52 UTC – Details)



Delightful Christmas Atmosphere — 4 pack of Christmas train themed yard signs with elements like Santa Clause, reindeer, gingerbread man, snowman, Christmas tree and so on. The cute and unique Christmas decorations for home with strong Christmas atmosphere must be highly attractive.
Sturdy & Waterproof — The waterproof corrugated plastic signs are durable and won’t fake or break easily. The Christmas decorations can go through extreme weathers. You may also stick them on lawn, wall, windows, doors and Christmas trees as you like.
Ideal Christmas Decorations Clearance — The Christmas lawn signs are great for many places. You may decorate your yard, lawn, front door or rooms to add some Christmas favors. Let’s have a happy Christmas with the Xmas decorations outdoor/indoor.
Valuable Characters Set — The locomotive is 12*14.4″, the carriages are13.2*12″. The combination of the train yard sign is 51.6*14.4″. Eye-catching for better decorating and festive effects. There are 4 Christmas themed signs and 8 plastic sticks. Super convenient to install with the stakes attached.
Pass the Spirits of Christmas — Abundant Christmas elements and vivid colors made it full of spirits of Xmas from your place. Attracting the attention of passers-by and your neighbors. The Christmas train yard signs will bring your family and friends fun and happiness.

Price: $10.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:52 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About Us:

Tevxj creates premium party products that love life and have fun.

Our mission: Vivid design, fun elements, to provide customers with chic party kits to make your party more exciting and impressive!

Core Values: Passionate and Focused, Courageous to Innovate, Work Together, and Improve Quality

Halloween

Honeycomb Centerpieces

Christmas

Window Gel Clings

Table cover

Hanukkah

back to school

By Tevxj

Have a great party time! !

Package Include:You will get 8pcs glow in the dark large cartoons Xmas yard signs,16 plastic stakes and 4 pieces of 2m string light.Large size and large quantity will give you a extra-value meal.
Premium Quality:Made of plastic cardboard, light and durable, waterproof and weatherproof. High quality printing technology will not fade easily.These Christmas yard sign with light are very suitalbe for outdoor, and can be reused for many years.
Easy to use:These Christmas yard decorations has Simple Assembly Required.The package will give you 8 pieces of large sign and 16 plastic poles. You only need to insert two poles into the North Pole sign and press them into the ground. The package also comes with 4 pieces of 2m string light and 40 stickers. You can stick these string lights on signs to make them glow in the dark.
Unique Design:Unlike other products, the design of these Christmas yard signs are more interesting and vivid. Sticking them in the ground will create the effect of coming out of the ground.It will be a unique decoration for Christmas.
Christmas Decorations:These Christmas yard signs are specific and rich in Christmas elements. Decorating them in your yard will attract the attention of neighbors and passers-by and make your Christmas memorable.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:07:24 UTC – Details)

Product Description

21in 12Pack Candy Cane Christmas Pathway Markers Lights with Stake

8 Models

Christmas candy cane pathway lights modes include fixed, blinking / flashing, slowly fading, chase / flashing, wave, combination, sequence, and progressive.

Red Light

Upgraded red and white candy lights come with 2 different styles of Christmas pendants (snowman and star), and the red lights are more cozy

Easy to Install

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Light Color
red and white multicolor none

Power Supply
plug in plug in none

12 pack Christmas outdoor decor: Each light up candy canes 21 inches high with 6 LEDs, space between each candy light: 50 cm/19.7 inches, plug lead length 3 meters/9.8 feet, total length 7.5 meters/24.6 feet, including 72 LED bulbs. With IP44 waterproof rating, lighted candy canes outdoor are suitable for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, and can withstand rain, sun or snow without worrying about short circuit or weather damage when using.
8 Adjustment Modes: Candy cane led lights can be adjusted by adjusting the buttons on the configured adapter to meet your needs for different holidays and different lighting effects.Christmas candy cane pathway lights plugged into the power supply, press the controller to adjust the mode, once you press the controller, 8 modes can be automatically switched.
Easy Installation: The candy cane yard lights come with sturdy stakes, you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively. Each light set comes with end-to-end plugs and stackable plugs that can be connected to up to multiple sets, giving you more options to decorate your yard!
Multiple scene: Sidewalk Candy cane lights can be placed neatly on the ground, in snowdrifts, in potted plants, or hung on fences, handrails, eaves, windowsills and mantels, or even decorate your Christmas tree.Light up candy canes outdoor are also great for creative gift-giving, send your kids to your elders and they will surely have a memorable Christmas day.

you just need to insert the stakes into the candy cane tubes, secure the cane lights firmly and choose the right spacing for the cane lights respectively.

IP44 Waterproof

These candy cane lights are mains powered, remains safe and luminous in rainy and snowy days, cast a classic Christmas silhouette.

Product Description

Specification:

Size: 4*3.6*6Ft (length*width*height)Leading Wire length: 9FtTether length: 10FtMaterial: Inflatable: IP44 waterproof polyester，water bag: PVCProduct color: brown mainlyProduct element: Gingerbread Man + Christmas Hat + Christmas Candy CaneNumber of LED lights: 2Lighting mode: steady onLighting color: cool whitePower supply: plug (12V-1A)

Package Includes: 1 x Christmas Gingerbread Man Inflatable 4 x Plastic ground stakes 3 x Long Tethers 1 x water bag 2 x Built-in LED Lights 1 x Adapter 1 x Built-in Blower 1 x Manual

[ Inflatable Christmas Gingerbread Man Decorations ] A Fun for 6 Ft tall sitting Christmas Inflatable Gingerbread Man with Christmas hat, holding a candy cane in his left hand. Includes an inflatable, 4 ground stakes, 3pcs 10ft tethers and 1 water bag, a plug and built-in fan.Copyright Certificated Model.
[ Light up Xmas Decor ] The Christmas inflatable Gingerbread Man with 2 LED lights built inside, light up your yard and lawn at nights. Bringing your family, neighbors and guests endless surprises and joy.
[ Fast Inflation ] With 1A built-in fan and 12V adapter with UL certification. Fully self inflates in minutes with built-in fan after plug into a standard electrical outlet. After the parties, just unplug the Christmas decor and fold it up for storage and reuse. An zipper at the bottom of inflatables for fast deflation.
[ Stability and Sturdiness ] Come with water bag, tethers and stakes. Simply fill the water bag with sand or water and put it into the inflatables. And use the stakes and tethers to fix it when used outdoor ground. Made of waterproof polyester fiber, which is not easy to fade and damage.
[ Christmas Party Decorations ] The Christmas decoration is festival and cute. Suitable for Christmas outdoor decoration, yard, lawn, garden, etc.

Merry Christmas Happy New Year

HUYIENO Christmas decoration, creating a nostalgic decorative charm, and delight your neighbors and guests to your Christmas party.

Christmas Decorations

Christmas Decorations

Auto ON/OFF–Solar lights automatically light up at night and automatically turns off during the day. Save your bills and good for environment.
Exciting & Attractive Christmas Lawn Decorations – This set of lawn decorations are making it easy to display on lawns, driveways or courtyards. Perfect for yard/lawn decorations!
Easy Assemble And Detach – Our solar garden light sets are easy to assemble and detach. Simply insert two stakes into each metal signs and press into the ground to display. Stick these signs into your lawn for easy yard display or use them as decorative photo props at the party.

1,692 ratings

4.8 out of 5 stars

Release date January 30, 2022
Manufacturer Dolphin Hat Games

Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:20:35 UTC – Details)


Santa Cookie Elf Candy Snowman is the Christmas themed edition of our wildly popular part game Taco Cat Goat Cheese Pizza!
HOLIDAY VERSION OF OUR WILDLY POPULAR PARTY GAME- Perfect for all-ages.
PLAY IT ANY TIME ANY PLACE- Convenient take anywhere size game.
SIMPLE AND HILARIOUS- Fast paced laugh out loud fun for any get together.
GET ROLLING IN SECONDS- Takes only a minute to learn and gameplay lasts for about 10 to 15 minutes.
PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR FAMILY FESTIVITIES- Game night merriment

What’s Included:

  • Instructions
  • 55 regular character cards
  • 3 Reindeer special cards
  • 3 Drums special cards
  • 3 Silent Night special cards
  • 3-8 players
  • 8 years and up
  • 10 min Playing time

Playing Santa Cookie Elf Candy Snowman will be a night of merriment!

Bu don’t just take our word for it

“We have the taco, cat, goat cheese, pizza game and LOVE it so we knew this one would be perfect for Christmas. And we LOVE it!!!”

“I’ve purchased this game as a stocking stuffer for my 9-year-old. She and the rest of the family enjoy the game a lot. It’s a simple game that “tests” your memory and reactiveness. The drawings on cards are pretty adorable. A round of game is fairly short, so it works well when you’re busy but your child wants to play a game with you.”

-Amazon Customers

Read more

Play and Say!

Play a card while saying the next word in Santa Cookie Elf Candy Snowman

Slap!

If it’s a match! The last person to slap takes all the cards

Actions!

To win this holiday game, you’ll need to show your reindeer antlers, drum the table, or “Shh!” for silent night.

(as of Nov 29,2022 01:09:41 UTC – Details)


Give the gift of nature! Our garden tools set includes a spade, cultivator and weeder in a gift ready box. Perfect for the gardener in your life! Santa Barbara Design Studio is all about imagination and design, working with artists in an effort to be fun, fab, and unique while creating eclectic collections encouraging personal style. Since 1976, SBDS has encouraged our customers to take a chance and experience something new and different. Our passion for finding the next wonderful product has translated into a broad line drawn from the works of the most talented and trendsetting designers. Experience the Santa Barbara Design Studio vibe.
YOU GROW GIRL TOOL SET: Gift boxed set of 3 essential garden tools; includes a hand spade, cultivator, and weeder – everything you need to get your garden started, just add seeds
DIMENSIONS: Book Box: 13.5″ W x 1.6″ H x 2″ D; Spade: H 14.4″ x W 3″ x D 1.75″; Cultivator: H 12.5″ x W 3″ x D 2.25″; Weeder: H 13.6″ x W 2.8″ x D 5.25″
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Tools are made with sturdy stainless steel and hardy beech wood – made to withstand years of use
MAKES A GREAT GIFT: Attractively packaged in a corrugated gift box; includes tips for planting an herb garden on inside cover
EASY TO GIVE, EASY TO LOVE: Santa Barbara Design Studio’s book-style boxed sets make gift-giving easy; there is something for everyone on your list – bakers, cooks, baristas, cheese lovers, cocktail mixologists, and so much more
